text:
(By the way, by changing te label names, I cant get
servlet code from any .jsp file. I receive the
error: " file .....myjsp.jsp generated a general
exception java.util.EmptyStackSception". Could you
help with this?)
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text:
What problems do the long labels cause you?  The same sorts of long labels
are present in catalina.bat (used to start Tomcat), and it works fine under
many flavors of Windows (95, 98, NT, 2000).
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
